actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Resolution to disapprove certain regulations submitted to the House by the Commissioner of Education in accordance with section 411 of the Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, relating to the family contribution schedule under the basic educational opportunity grant program.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves regulations submitted to the House by the Commissioner of Education in accordance with the Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, relating to the family contribution schedule under the basic educational opportunity grant program.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove certain regulations submitted to the House by the Commissioner of Education in accordance with section 411 of the Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, relating to the family contribution schedule under the basic educational opportunity grant program.
